description:
L'hôtel est situé juste à côté de l'un des plus grands parcs urbains de France, le parc de la Tête d'Or, et du Rhône. Il se trouve à 5 minutes à pied du musée d'art contemporain et à 3 minutes à pied du centre de conventions.
A continental breakfast buffet, a private parking and a spa with sauna, hammam and hot tubs are available for an extra cost. The residence also has luggage storage in reception.
name: A Taste of India

description:
Hotel Saint Vincent is located 500 metres from Lyon City Hall. All of its rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, exposed beams and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries.
Located 5 minutes' walk from Acropolis Palais des Expositions and Acropolis tram stops in Nice, Hipark offers self-catering apartments with access to a seasonal outdoor pool with sun terrace, a sauna and a fitness centre. The property is 2 km from the Promenade des Anglais. Free WiFi is available.
name: A&B Bar

description:
The elegant rooms feature wooden floor, a desk and a telephone. Free Wi-Fi access is provided everywhere in the hotel.
Each air-conditioned soundproofed studio or suite features a fully equipped kitchenette with a refrigerator, oven, electric kettle, dishwasher and kitchenware. They offer a living room with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom.
name: Abe’s By The Sea

description:
A breakfast is served every morning in the dining room that features stone walls. Restaurants are located less than 100 metres away.
A buffet breakfast is served daily in the dining room. There is a 24-hour front desk and a laundry service for an additional cost.
Hipark is a 5-minute walk from Nice-Riquier Train Station and Nice's Old Town is 1.5 km away. Private parking is available for an additional cost.
name: Ali Baba’s Restaurant

description: Hotel Saint Vincent is located 50 metres from the River Saône and 500 metres from Lyon Museum of Fine Arts. Lyon Perrache Train Station is situated 2 km away.The Adagio Nice Promenade des anglais is located on the Promenade des Anglais. This beach-front aparthotel offers air-conditioned accommodation with sea or city views and free Wi-Fi internet access.
name: Anegada Beach Club

description: Set in central Lyon, this hotel is a 10-minute tram ride from Part-Dieu Train Station. It has a 24-hour reception and offers soundproofed guest rooms with satellite TV. The soundproof accommodation at the Nice Excellior has satellite TV, en suite facilities and a private balcony or terrace. The apartments also have a seating area and a kitchenette equipped with a microwave and dishwasher.
name: Anegada Reef Hotel Restaurant

description: All of the rooms include a telephone and have a simple décor. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served everyday. Adagio Nice Promenade des anglais also provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and a currency exchange service. Adagio Nice Promenade des anglais is a 10-minute drive from Nice Train Station and the Old Town. Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is a just 5 km away.
name: Aromas Cigar & Martini Bar

description: Enjoy a buffet breakfast every morning while reading the newspapers provided at Hôtel du Helder. All of the rooms include a telephone and have a simple décor. Each room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. All of the rooms are serviced by a lift. A buffet breakfast is served everyday. Adagio Nice Promenade des anglais also provides a 24-hour reception with a tour desk and a currency exchange service. Adagio Nice Promenade des anglais is a 10-minute drive from Nice Train Station and the Old Town. Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is a just 5 km away.
name: Bananakeet Cafe

description: Wi-Fi access is provided in the public areas at the Helder hotel, and bike rental is possible on site. Guillotière Metro Station is 450 metres away and the Decorative Arts Museum is a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Lyon Airport is just 15 km away. Each studio has an office area, private bathroom and TV, and the kitchenettes are equipped with cooking facilities, fridge and microwave.
name: Bananas Bar

description: Guillotière Metro Station is 450 metres away and the Decorative Arts Museum is a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Lyon Airport is just 15 km away.
name: Bath And Turtle/Chez Bamboo Restaurant

description: 7th arr. is a great choice for travellers interested in old town, monuments andarchitecture. Guillotière Metro Station is 450 metres away and the Decorative Arts Museum is a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Lyon Airport is just 15 km away.
name: Beans Coffee Co.

description: Séjours & Affaires Lyon St-Nicolas is located in central Lyon, 300 metres from the Part Dieu TGV train station. The studio apartments offer equipped kitchenettes and free Wi-Fi access.
name: Bell’s Café

description: Each studio has an office area, private bathroom and TV, and the kitchenettes are equipped with cooking facilities, fridge and microwave. Séjours & Affaires Lyon St-Nicolas is located in central Lyon, 300 metres from the Part Dieu TGV train station. The studio apartments offer equipped kitchenettes and free Wi-Fi access.
name: Big Bamboo

description: Séjours & Affaires offers free weekly cleaning and a meeting room. Hotel services available for an additional cost include parking and laundry facilities.
name: Bitter End

description: Séjours & Affaires Lyon St-Nicolas is well located for visiting Place Bellecour and Vieux Lyon (the old town).
name: Bobby's Marketplace

description: Novotel Lyon La Part Dieu is located 130 metres from La Part-Dieu TGV Train Station in central Lyon, close to the Part-Dieu Shopping Centre and Les Halles de Lyon Paul Bocuse indoor market. Séjours & Affaires Lyon St-Nicolas is well located for visiting Place Bellecour and Vieux Lyon (the old town).
name: Brandywine Estate Restaurant

description: Each guest room is soundproofed and air-conditioned, and is equipped with free WiFi and a satellite flat-screen TV. Novotel Lyon La Part Dieu is located 130 metres from La Part-Dieu TGV Train Station in central Lyon, close to the Part-Dieu Shopping Centre and Les Halles de Lyon Paul Bocuse indoor market.
name: Brandywine Roof Top Restaurant

description: Lyon Marriott Hotel Cité Internationale offers air-conditioned rooms beside the Rhone River and the Tete d’Or Park. It is housed within the Cite International complex that includes a casino. Guests can use the fitness centre for free. Each guest room is soundproofed and air-conditioned, and is equipped with free WiFi and a satellite flat-screen TV.
name: BVI Snuba
